attributes.action: promote the Glastonbury festival a significant event of cultural interest and protect its survival by law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Glastonbury is an incredible, dynamic eveant. the largest greenfield festival in the world and something that should be celebrated throuout the country. Each year the local council imposes harsher conditions for its license. I believe protection under law would esnure the festival can continue, unhindered for many years to come.
